version_description:
Welcome to our biggest and most significant update yet - Portal V2.

Here’s what’s new:

* 4 beautiful new Portals: ‘Julian Alps Rain’ (Slovenia), ‘Spring Barley Field’ (Devon, UK), ‘Monteverde Cloud Forest’ (Costa Rica); ‘Dusk in Tyrol’ (Aus

Welcome to our biggest and most significant update yet - Portal V2.

Here’s what’s new:

* 4 beautiful new Portals: ‘Julian Alps Rain’ (Slovenia), ‘Spring Barley Field’ (Devon, UK), ‘Monteverde Cloud Forest’ (Costa Rica); ‘Dusk in Tyrol’ (Aus

This release includes a few small improvements and bug fixes:

* Fixes an issue where the app can be killed when running a timer in the background on older devices
* Improved the audio control interface with the option to hide the "mix with other

This release includes a few small improvements and bug fixes:

* Fixes an issue where the app can be killed when running a timer in the background on older devices
* Improved the audio control interface with the option to hide the "mix with other

* A beautiful new dawn chorus Portal captured in a quiet London garden during lockdown - made available to everyone for free
* 3 new breathing exercises
* Alarm improvements allowing you to set the wakeup volume and choose a different backup alarm s

* A beautiful new dawn chorus Portal captured in a quiet London garden during lockdown - made available to everyone for free
* 3 new breathing exercises
* Alarm improvements allowing you to set the wakeup volume and choose a different backup alarm s

Portal V3 - featuring a beautiful new library interface and our biggest content update yet.

* Scottish Highland collection of 14 Portals
* Slovenian Alps collection of 11 Portals
* Curated collections organised around use and location
* P

* P

* Support for the latest iPhones and iPad Air
* Improvements to Siri Shortcuts with support for the new Sleep wind down shortcuts in the iOS 14 Health App, suggested shortcuts and correct listing of available downloaded Portals

* Support for the latest iPhones and iPad Air
* Improvements to Siri Shortcuts with support for the new Sleep wind down shortcuts in the iOS 14 Health App, suggested shortcuts and correct listing of available downloaded Portals

We've always taken a strong stance on privacy - we don't require a login or collect any of your personal information and we've never included any 3rd party ads or ad trackers. The only data we've ever collected has been anonymised analytics and crash repo

We've always taken a strong stance on privacy - we don't require a login or collect any of your personal information and we've never included any 3rd party ads or ad trackers. The only data we've ever collected has been anonymised analytics and crash repo
This is a small release that fixes a bug with the lock screen control and a potential issue with Philips Hue bridge discovery.
This is a small release that fixes a bug with the lock screen control and a potential issue with Philips Hue bridge discovery.

We've been stuck in lockdown over here in London and Andy's taken the opportunity to do some early spring cleaning in the app, squishing some bugs and implementing a few small features we've been wanting to introduce for a while!

New Features 
-

We've been stuck in lockdown over here in London and Andy's taken the opportunity to do some early spring cleaning in the app, squishing some bugs and implementing a few small features we've been wanting to introduce for a while!

New Features 
-

Spatial audio is almost here – and we couldn’t be more excited!

We’re real nerds when it comes to sound quality and delivering your ears the most immersive and realistic experience possible. So, we’ve been working hard to amp things up and bring sp
